review_data.title: First class. Fine "Indian" food!
review_data.content: Thoughtful and well curated menu. Food well executed. Best "Indian" food this British expat has eaten in Switzerland and clearly the owner/chef takes pride. Quality ingredients. The chef learned his profession in London and Pakistan. We are already planning a return visit.

review_data.title: Preis/Leistung stimmt nicht
review_data.content: Bedienung: freundlich Essen ok (sehr scharf ohne Kennzeichnung) Preis/Leistung am Abend: unverschämt

review_data.title: Pakistani and Indian Restaurant in Mannendorf - no need to go into the city!
review_data.content: Pakistani and Indian dishes, not only the „standard“ dishes you usually find in an Indian restaurant. Tasty and good portions. Main dishes in the chf 30-40 range, with rice. I could get tap water for free (sadly, not always the case in Switzerland) and beer...More

review_data.title: Really god - service is fab
review_data.content: As we get back to something approaching normal, this place deserves a visit or a take-away order. We have done take-away and eat-in in last 10 days. Both worked really well; when I rang for take-away, there was no answer and then they called back,...More

review_data.title: Lieblings-Inder
review_data.content: Das butterfried chicken ist absolut fantastisch! Auch die anderen Speisen überzeugen, der Service passt und das Ambiente ebenso.

review_data.title: phantastisch!!

review_data.title: Food is what matters...And Spice Village is the ultimate result to it..!!!
review_data.content: One of the best Indian Restaurants I have visited...!! As soon as you enter the ambience itself captures your heart...And then food gives you that feeling as if you can just keep eating and eating...And finally service is like cherry on the cake...Something feels empty...More

review_data.title: Very Pleasant
review_data.content: A nice evening dinner with friendly service. Our curry dishes were delicious, only comment is the salad was clearly not fresh, but can be forgiven with the friendliness and good main course.

review_data.title: Great food, nice atmosphere
review_data.content: Good, wholesome Indian food in a nice atmosphere. Each time we go, the food gets even better. Can easily cater for gluten-free eaters.

review_data.title: Best Indian I've had in ages - what a yummy treat and great value for money!
review_data.content: I just loved the food. A great mis of indian food. Service very friendly and buffet style eating such great value for money. I love to try a little of everything rather than one course, and this buffet had a wide assortment of very delicious...More

review_data.title: Authentic Indian Food
review_data.content: We just drove by and saw the restaurant from the street it seems to be completely refurbished and not the Doener / Pizza place anymore! Absolutely great, delicious food combined with very friendly staff! One of the best indian food i had in Switzerland!

review_data.title: A Weekday Takeaway
review_data.content: We were quite hungry and not in the mood to cook so we decided to try this Indian restaurant we had heard about from our friends. I went by and picked up the food. The portions were generous and the food very authentic Indian food....More
